summary: 02 V 131/FMVSS 201 AIR BAG DEPLOYMENT & 04 V 357 000/CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR/MIL:  THE CONSUMER WAS UNABLE TO GET THE RECALLS HONORED BECAUSE THE SENSOR LOT NUMBER DID NOT MATCH FOR THE CAMSHAFT.
